Header.title: ARVOS
Header.paragraph: Advanced Robotics and Visualization for Ophthalmic Surgery

About.paragraph: This workshop brings together active research groups and key industries, sharing the latest technological advancements related to ophthalmic procedures. The areas to be covered within this workshop are:

News.body: Details for poster submissions will be announced.
ARVOS is accepted as an IROS 2022 Workshop
